channel.title: Help!-Coder Needed!-URGENTLY!
channel.description:
Hello it's alextheman again.... I need someone to help me build a server , via Teamviewer.
The source needs to be 317 with: Latest Items 3 Digit Health i.e constitution lvl 28 = 280hp rather than 28hp Unlimited Summoning Time Moneypouch Grand Exchange XP Counter Modified XP Rate All Current Bosses Working Tzok-Haar waves Wildy is Non-PVP as that's where I want bosse's spawned. But have some place PVP , like past Shanty Past. Working Drop's Fully Working World That's pretty much it.
Also I'm owner. My friend co-owner and you get admin because of your help , plus a income share when we sell stuff via pay-pal
And you'll be considered admin when I finally learnt Java etc , etc. and I start a new server. :D Sound good? Reply or PM me! :D

item.title: Help!-Coder Needed!-URGENTLY!
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

[quote=“alextheman, post:1, topic:439401”]Hello it’s alextheman again…
I need someone to help me build a server ,
via Teamviewer.

The source needs to be 317 with:
Latest Items
3 Digit Health i.e constitution lvl 28 = 280hp rather than 28hp
Unlimited Summoning Time
Moneypouch
Grand Exchange
XP Counter
Modified XP Rate
All Current Bosses
Working Tzok-Haar waves
Wildy is Non-PVP as that’s where I want bosse’s spawned.
But have some place PVP , like past Shanty Past.
Working Drop’s
Fully Working World
That’s pretty much it.

Also I’m owner.
My friend co-owner
and you get admin because of your help , plus a income share when we sell stuff via pay-pal

And you’ll be considered admin when I finally learnt Java etc , etc.
and I start a new server.
Sound good? Reply or PM me! :D[/quote]

Even if I did help…since you said 317, it’d come out looking like this: http://tinyurl.com/7rosgtn
Since anything else isn’t 317.
And also because I’m against the ‘constitution’ update, I’d also add a command like ::hp to switch from normal health points to constitution and back or something…
Good luck on coding your own server. ~^^

Read full topic

item.title: Help!-Coder Needed!-URGENTLY!
item.dc:creator: @Reverse_Hate Reverse Hate
item.description:
@Reverse_Hate wrote:

Do it yourself, lazybutt. Learn something for once. Why would people help you when you're not even doing anything?
Also, If someone would make a full server like this why would they settle for Admin when you and your friend do nothing and get Owner and Co-Owner.?
